title: Louis Philippe III Eastern King Bed
description:
The Louis Philippe III storage bed is exclusively designed and filled with romantic spirit. A piece crafted and inspired by the luxurious designs of the past, this gorgeous bed features a stunning rectangular bookcase headboard and low profile footboard all in an elegant dark gray finish. Expertly detailed, this unique bed provides plenty of storage space with five drawers on the headboard and two drawers on the footboard. This collection will make the perfect companion for your favorite bedroom style, available in different colors to choose from cherry, white, black and antique gray.

title: Northville Queen Bed
description:
The Northville traditional design of this collection is distinguished by flowing lines and decorative details on every piece-curved fronts and tops, acanthus leaf accents, elaborately carved bracket feet and ornate pulls in an antique renter finish. The translucent platinum finish accentuates the graining of its rubber wood solids and oak veneer construction. The bed's headboard accent the finish covered by a button tufted PU. Attention to detail continues in the spacious felt-lined drawers. Enjoy the relaxing and lavish environment! Case pieces have shaped tops and fronts, picture frame molding with inner decorative scroll work molding, egg and dart molding detail top and bottom, captured panel side panels with decorative scroll work molding, canthus leave detail on the pilasters and heavily detailed feet.
